%title /ab/experiments/{experimentId}/alternatives/{alternativeId}/rule-params PUT 更新一个Alternative的规则参数  

=/ab/experiments/{experimentId}/alternatives/{alternativeId}/rule-params PUT=

==功能 ==
更新一个候选方案 `Alternative` 的规则参数

==URL==
/ab/experiments/{experimentId}/alternatives/{alternativeId}/rule-params

==HTTP请求方式==
PUT

==请求类型==
XML JSON

==请求参数==
* 路径参数
| 参数名        | 值     | 描述                                       |
|---------------|--------|--------------------------------------------|
| experimentId  | String | 要更新的 `Alternative` 所属的 `Experiment` |
| alternativeId | String | 要更新的 `Alternative`                     |

# XML :
{{{ class="brush:xml"
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
                <ruleParams>
                    <param1>30</param1>
                </ruleParams>
  }}}
  
# Json:
{{{ class="brush:js"

                {
                    "param1": "30",
                    "param2": null,
                    "param3": null,
                    "param4": null,
                    "param5": null,
                    "param6": null,
                    "param7": null,
                    "param8": null,
                    "param9": null
                }
  }}}
 

==返回结果==
| 状态 | 结果     |
|------|----------|
| 200  | 更新成功 |


==测试==
{{{ class="brush:bash"
curl -v -X put -HContent-type:application/xml --data "<xml data>" https://baseurl/experiments/{experimentId}/alternatives
curl -v -X put -HContent-type:application/json --data "<json data>" https://baseurl/experiments/{experimentId}/alternatives
  }}}
